text: Sir Shahnawaz Khan Mamdot (1883 - March 28, 1942) was a Punjabi landowner and supporter of the All India Muslim League (AIML) in its demand for a separate Pakistan. In March 1940, he was one of the principal hosts for the AIML's famous Lahore Conference. Category:Punjabi people Category:1942 deaths Category:1883 births Category:Muslim League
title: Shahnawaz Khan Mamdot
